extended_boot_image.description: Image of Extended Boot in CBOR format, signed by IFX

allowed.description: Indicates who is allowed to access the AP. The option is applicable when CPU control is 'Allowed'

dbgen.description: Invasive Debug. It implies non-invasive is also enabled

spiden.description: Secure Privileged Invasive Debug. Requires 'secure' option set to true

spniden.description: Secure Privileged Non-Invasive Debug. Requires 'secure' option set to true

secure.description: Enables Secure debug of CM33 CPU. Secure invasive and non-invasive debug policies are applicable only if this option is enabled

ap.description: System access port (SYS-AP) restriction. The SYS-AP restrictions are not enforced in the Development LCS

allowed.description: Indicates who is allowed to access the AP. The option is applicable when AP control is 'Allowed'

mpc_ppc_enable.description: Indicates whether the system access port is restricted according to the settings in the next four fields. If this field is set to 'false', the next restrictions will not be enforced

rram_otp_enable.description: This field indicates if access is allowed to general purpose OTP

rram_nvm_enable.description: This field indicates what portion of user programmable NVM is accessible through the system access port. When a fraction value is selected, only a portion of NVM starting at the bottom is exposed

ram_enable.description: This field indicates what portion of SRAM is accessible through the system access port. Only a portion of SRAM starting at the bottom of the area is exposed, like the 'rram_nvm' option

mmio_enable.description: This field indicates what portion of the MMIO region is accessible through the system access port
mmio_enable.applicable_conf: All MMIO registers, Boot Status, RAM app only, No MMIO access

permission.description: Permission for transition to RMA LCS

debug_key.description: ECDSA public key, used to verify debug token. Use the path to the ECDSA P-256 public key or a 65-byte hex string

reprovisioning.description: Reprovisioning policy. Used to restrict the assets reprovisioning

user_keys.description: List of user keys. Fill in the key data with your values

kid.description: The ID of the key in the PSA vault. The value between '0x40000000' and '0x7FFEFFFF'

alg.applicable_conf: ECDSA, RSA, AES-CTR, AES-CBC, AES-ECB, ECDH, HKDF_ALG_SHA_256, IFX_SE_ALG_KDF_AES_CMAC, NONE

use.description: Key usage flags are encoded in a bitmask (usage example SIGN|ENCRYPT)
use.applicable_conf: EXPORT, COPY, CACHE, ENCRYPT, DECRYPT, SIGN_MESSAGE, VERIFY_MESSAGE, SIGN_HASH, VERIFY_HASH, DERIVE, VERIFY_DERIVATION

key.description: Path to the key file in PEM, DER, or JWK format

owner.description: Key owner identifier. The value between '-2147483648' and '2147483647'

secure_boot.description: Disable/Enable secure boot option by setting the value to false/true

clock.description: Defines default core clock speed in MHz

listen_window.description: Defines listen window timeout in ms

enable_alt_serial.description: Disable/Enable Alternate serial interface by setting the value to false/true

enable.description: Disable/Enable CM33 OEM RAM applications by setting the value to false/true

address.description: Start address of the CM33 OEM RAM application

oem_alt_boot.description: Disable/Enable alternate boot by setting the value to false/true

oem_alt_app_address.description: Alternate starting location of OEM application

smif_chip_select.description: Chip select for primary external flash

smif_data_width.description: Select data width used to interface the external flash

smif_data_select.description: Select data IO pins for d0/d1

boundary_scan.description: Indicates whether boundary scan is enabled

oem_key_revocation.description: Request for OEM RoT key revocation
